content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (Position x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (1,1) and (3,1)
- Two burner inserters at positions (1.5,2.5) and (3.5,2.5)
- Two wooden chests storing iron plates at positions (1.5,3.5) and (3.5,3.5)

### Additional Storage (Position x=5.5, y=2.5-3.5)
Consists of:
- One wooden chest at position (5.5,3.5)
- One burner inserter at position (5.5,2.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line (Position x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (2,7) and (4,7)
- Two burner inserters at positions (2.5,8.5) and (4.5,8.5)
- Two wooden chests storing copper plates at positions (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5)

### Power Generation System (Position x=2.5-13.5, y=35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (2.5,35.5)
- Boiler at position (7,35.5)
- Steam engine at position (13.5,35.5)
- PipeGroup connecting offshore pump to boiler (water)
- PipeGroup connecting boiler to steam engine (steam)
- Electricity distribution network with multiple electric poles

### Disconnected Offshore Pump
- Single offshore pump at position (-5.5,26.5) not connected to any system

ERROR TIPS

### Technology Requirements Error
- Research required technologies before attempting to craft items
- Specifically, Automation technology needs to be researched before crafting Assembling Machine 1

### Resource Management
- Ensure boiler has fuel before expecting power generation
- Current boiler shows "out of fuel" warning

### Connection Issues
- Ensure offshore pumps are properly connected to the fluid system
- The pump at (-5.5,26.5) shows "No fluid present in connections" warning

### Production Line Status
- Address "no ingredients to smelt" warnings in furnaces to maintain continuous production
- All furnaces currently show this warning, indicating they need raw materials
